title: South Facing 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom + Private Terrace | Available 9/5
posting_body: Welcome to Konrad on the Park
Vibrant city living with a rare parkside appeal.

Just steps from the culture and convenience of Hayes Valley, Konrad on the Park is an intimate boutique apartment building featuring elevated finishes, clean design, and enviable proximity to Jefferson Square Park.

Equally a recharging refuge and well-connected nexus, this collection of studios, one- and two-bedroom homes allows residents to enjoy the city as they choose, whether indulging in the surrounding green space or taking in panoramic views from a signature ~6,000-square-foot rooftop terrace.
Amenities Include:
Gym with Personal Training
HIIT Fitness Center with Weekly Classes
City Skyline & Jefferson Square Park Views
Pet Friendly
Bike Spaces
Terraces and Balconies on Select Residences
BBQ & Fire Pits
Package Room with Cold Storage
Dog Walking
Secure & Assigned Parking
Dog Washing Station with K900 Pet Wash
EV Parking
